pageContext.claim: “Can't let Brett Kavanaugh give Radical Left Democrat (Liberal Plus) Opinions based on threats of Impeaching him over made up stories (sound familiar?), false allegations, and lies. This is the game they play. Fake and Corrupt News is working overtime! #ProtectKavanaugh”
pageContext.analysis: There are questions about the most recent New York Times article focused on one of Kavanaugh's accusers. However, Christine Blasey Ford said she decided to come forward with an allegation that Kavanaugh sexually assaulted her in 1982 only after a confidential letter she sent to her congresswoman leaked this year. “I am no one’s pawn,” Ford testified before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Sept. 27, 2018. Trump at first called Ford’s testimony credible. But once the Senate confirmed Kavanaugh to the Supreme Court, the president called the whole thing a “all fiction, made up stuff." Regardless, she has not recanted her testimony.
